languages.text: "Извините, что вставил{mf||а} мозги вашему механическому солдатику".
"I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."
languages.original_text: "Извините, что вставил{mf||а} мозги вашему механическому солдатику".

traits.locale_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."
"I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."
"I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."
"I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."
"I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

languages.text: "Ich entschuldige mich, dass ich den Kopf Eures mechanischen Soldaten mit einem Gehirn versehen habe."
languages.original_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

traits.locale_text: "Ich entschuldige mich, dass ich den Kopf Eures mechanischen Soldaten mit einem Gehirn versehen habe."

languages.text: « Veuillez m'excuser d'avoir osé introduire une once de réflexion dans la tête de votre soldat mécanique. »
languages.original_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez m'excuser d'avoir osé introduire une once de réflexion dans la tête de votre soldat mécanique. »

languages.text: “我让你的机械士兵长出了脑子，我对此深感抱歉。”
languages.original_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

traits.locale_text: “我让你的机械士兵长出了脑子，我对此深感抱歉。”

languages.text: «Pido disculpas por introducir un cerebro en la cabeza de su soldado mecánico».
languages.original_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

traits.locale_text: «Pido disculpas por introducir un cerebro en la cabeza de su soldado mecánico».

languages.text: 「君の機械兵に脳を入れてしまったことは謝る」
languages.original_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

traits.locale_text: 「君の機械兵に脳を入れてしまったことは謝る」

languages.text: "Mekanik askerinizin aklını başına getirdiğim için özür diliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I do apologise for putting a brain in your mechanical soldier's head."

traits.locale_text: "Mekanik askerinizin aklını başına getirdiğim için özür diliyorum."
